= Tower of Hanoi Fast Agent =

This agent uses a less general representation that results in faster execution that of the [Agent_ToH_Simple Simple Tower of Hanoi Agent].  The general description of the task and the agent strategy from that agent page still apply.

=== Soar capabilities ===
  * Basic PSCM functions: State Elaboration, Operator Proposal, Operator Evaluation, Internal Operator Application
